GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a review object requested in the endpoint

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all the comments associated with the end point's review_id

comments.body: My dog loved this game too!
comments.author: mallionaire

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: takes a request of accepted usernames and a comment body to insert into database, serves the string comment

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: takes a number, updates the votes for the review_id, serves the updated row

updatedReview.title: Jenga
updatedReview.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: removes rows with the given comment_id from the database
